name: Haunted Hotel: Ancient Bane Collector's Edition
name_original: Haunted Hotel: Ancient Bane Collector's Edition
description:
Haunted Hotel: Ancient Bane Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It was originally released in 2014. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Haunted Hotel: Ancient Bane Collector's Edition is available on PC.
